title: Killer Nuns
description: The Sisters of Eternal Sorrows take their vows very, very seriously. They’re cleaning up the streets in their own special way. They’re nuns with a bad habit.
altHero: sexy nuns pose in a church wearing habits and revealing lingerie
alt1: the sexy nuns hold weapons and talk to some gangster looking dudes at a table
alt2: one of the nuns holds a bunch of cash in her hands
alt3: the nuns corner a drug dealer in a park, one nun has a knife to his throat
alt4: a clearly fake decapitated head of the drug dealer
